column4: A server was donated to our location, HP Netserver 5/100 LH with 64 MB RAM and 100 Mhz processor. I was hoping to run xubuntu off of it, or ubuntu server LTS. I cannot boot off of CD, the existing SCSI CDROM is fritzy and ide is not working, I cannot get into BIOS. Booting off of a floppy doesn't work because the scsi drive doesn't fit on it. the network boot process would not work either,...
...due to the above reasons. There is no USB. Any possible ideas? I'm really hoping to get this thing off of my workbench (it's been there for two weeks)
sometimes free computers are the most expensive ones. :)
